article_title: Does your physician have to prescribe antibiotics for every sore throat?
article_text:

twitter.description: There is a lot of jockeying ahead of the Supreme Court’s decision on the Affordable Care Act. Beyond posturing and heated rhetoric, there is a health care issue the two parties can work together ...
twitter.title: Does your physician have to prescribe antibiotics for every sor...

article_metadata.keywords: medical malpractice reform, u.s. healthcare, barack obama, hillary clinton, affordable care act, obamacare
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: Affordable Care Act, Barack Obama, Commentary, Hillary Clinton, Medical malpractice, Obamacare, u.s. healthcare
article_metadata.description: With the right medical malpractice reforms, physicians can reinforce high quality care and provide cover for those who don’t want to prescribe antibiotics for every sore throat.
